item.title: T900 Ultra 2 Max Smart Watch
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description: ✅ 1-3 days battery ( Varies with use). ✅ Display:2.3 inch HD IPS. ✅ Screen Resolution:320x280. ✅ Operation System: ANDROID, IOS. ✅ Waterproof : IP67(only daily using, no swimming/bathing/diving and so on). ✅ Water Resistance Depth:3BAR. ✅ Screen Material: IPS. ✅ Case Material: ALLOY. ✅ Material: Stainless steel. ✅ Charging mode: Magnetic wireless charging. ✅ App : hiwatch plus. ✅ Bluetooth call ,Auto Date, Complete Calendar, Multiple Time Zone, Water Resistant, chronograph, Solar, Moon Phase, Alarm, COMPASS, Luminous, DIVER, Repeater, Shock Resistant, Voice recorder, photography, Sleep Tracker, Fitness Tracker, Back Light, Stop Watch, Slide rule, Answer Call, Mood Tracker, Dial Call...etc.
item.content:encoded:
A smartwatch is a wearable computer in the form of a watch; modern smartwatches provide a local touchscreen interface for daily use, while an associated smartphone app provides for management and telemetry.
Feature : Wireless charging capability, Always display, Shows notification of Calls / Email / SMS / WhatsApp / WeChat & etc.

item.title: T500 Ultra Smartwatch
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description: ✅ Strap Material: Silicone. ✅ Main Screen: 1.99 inches LCD 250 x 285. ✅ Bluetooth-compatible: Bluetooth-compatible 5.0 supports Bluetooth-compatible calls. ✅ Charging mode: Magnetic Charging. ✅ Touch Screen: Full touch screen. ✅ Appearance Material: Zinc alloy. ✅ Waterproof: IP67 (the watch cannot be placed in water). ✅ Size: 38.5 x 44.5 x 14mm.
item.content:encoded: ✅ Strap Material: Silicone. ✅ Main Screen: 1.99 inches LCD 250 x 285. ✅ Bluetooth-compatible: Bluetooth-compatible 5.0 supports Bluetooth-compatible calls. ✅ Charging mode: Magnetic Charging. ✅ Touch Screen: Full touch screen. ✅ Appearance Material: Zinc alloy. ✅ Waterproof: IP67 (the watch cannot be placed in water). ✅ Size: 38.5 x 44.5 x 14mm.

item.title: KD99 Ultra Smart Watch
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description: ✅ Voice assistant built-in: YES ✅ Bluetooth-compatible Version: 5.1 ✅ Activity Tracked: Steps Tracker,Activity Tracker ✅ Touch Screen: YES ✅ App name: Hryfine ✅ CPU Model: 5609 ✅ Battery Detachable: No ✅ CPU Manufacturer: Mediatek ✅ Resolution: 240*286 ✅ Display Size: 1.85 inch ✅ Movement Type: Electronic ✅ Case Material: Alloy ✅ Battery Capacity: 180-220mAh ✅ Rear Camera: None ✅ RAM: 128MB ✅ System: Android Wear ✅ Type: On Wrist
